title: Bournemouth's Chris Mepham bid rejected by Brentford
description: Brentford have rejected a Â£5.5m offer from Bournemouth for centre-back Chris Mepham, Sky Sports News understands.
content: The bid included a number of potential add-ons but the Bees have told the Cherries Mepham is not for sale in this window.Bournemouth have been watching the 20-year-old in recent months, and Eddie Howe scouted him in person earlier in January.Mepham came through the Championship club's B team - the only one currently in England - and has shone across 13 appearances so far this term.Bournemouth are yet to sign a player yet in the January transfer window.
